mapper.select: select memId, memName, phone, memsex, IDCard, email, memInt, regisdate, userstate, remark, usersId, account, password, roleId, roleName, funList, mem_type_Id, memType, discount from hotelmanager.user_mem_type_view where memId= #{memid}

select memId, memName, phone, memsex, IDCard, email, memInt, regisdate, userstate, remark, usersId, account, password, roleId, roleName, funList, mem_type_Id, memType, discount from hotelmanager.user_mem_type_view limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into hotelmanager.user_mem_type_view(memId, memName, phone, memsex, IDCard, email, memInt, regisdate, userstate, remark, usersId, password, roleId, roleName, funList, mem_type_Id, memType, discount) values (#{memid}, #{memname}, #{phone}, #{memsex}, #{idcard}, #{email}, #{memint}, #{regisdate}, #{userstate}, #{remark}, #{usersid}, #{password}, #{roleid}, #{rolename}, #{funlist}, #{memTypeId}, #{memtype}, #{discount})

insert into hotelmanager.user_mem_type_view(memId, memName, phone, memsex, IDCard, email, memInt, regisdate, userstate, remark, usersId, password, roleId, roleName, funList, mem_type_Id, memType, discount) values
(#{entity.memid}, #{entity.memname}, #{entity.phone}, #{entity.memsex}, #{entity.idcard}, #{entity.email}, #{entity.memint}, #{entity.regisdate}, #{entity.userstate}, #{entity.remark}, #{entity.usersid}, #{entity.password}, #{entity.roleid}, #{entity.rolename}, #{entity.funlist}, #{entity.memTypeId}, #{entity.memtype}, #{entity.discount})

insert into hotelmanager.user_mem_type_view(memId, memName, phone, memsex, IDCard, email, memInt, regisdate, userstate, remark, usersId, password, roleId, roleName, funList, mem_type_Id, memType, discount) values
(#{entity.memid}, #{entity.memname}, #{entity.phone}, #{entity.memsex}, #{entity.idcard}, #{entity.email}, #{entity.memint}, #{entity.regisdate}, #{entity.userstate}, #{entity.remark}, #{entity.usersid}, #{entity.password}, #{entity.roleid}, #{entity.rolename}, #{entity.funlist}, #{entity.memTypeId}, #{entity.memtype}, #{entity.discount})
on duplicate key update memId = values(memId) , memName = values(memName) , phone = values(phone) , memsex = values(memsex) , IDCard = values(IDCard) , email = values(email) , memInt = values(memInt) , regisdate = values(regisdate) , userstate = values(userstate) , remark = values(remark) , usersId = values(usersId) , password = values(password) , roleId = values(roleId) , roleName = values(roleName) , funList = values(funList) , mem_type_Id = values(mem_type_Id) , memType = values(memType) , discount = values(discount)
mapper.update:
update hotelmanager.user_mem_type_view
memId = #{memid},
memName = #{memname},
phone = #{phone},
memsex = #{memsex},
IDCard = #{idcard},
email = #{email},
memInt = #{memint},
regisdate = #{regisdate},
userstate = #{userstate},
remark = #{remark},
usersId = #{usersid},
password = #{password},
roleId = #{roleid},
roleName = #{rolename},
funList = #{funlist},
mem_type_Id = #{memTypeId},
memType = #{memtype},
discount = #{discount},
where = #{}
